message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000.  What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 is my initial asking price, I understand your budget concerns.  Could you meet me at $17,000? It's a very fair offer for the value you'll gain.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm thinking $13,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
